Título: Final Exam

Autor: A. Bates

ISBN-13: 9780590432917

Idioma: English

Descripción: Kelly has always been afraid of final exams. Now she's scared to death.Something strange has been going on all week....something weird. It started with someone playing a few pranks on her at school. Trashing her locker. Stealing her purse. Then the pranks turned deadly.Someone doesn't want Kelly to graduate. They've prepared a special final exam, just for her. And she'd better not have any wrong answers ... because her life depends on it.

Serie: Point Horror
